dataSource.script: SELECT nc_objects.object_id object_id, nc_objects.name customer_name, customer_category.name customer_category, a.value customer_account_number, nc_list_values.value status, (SELECT listagg (locations, chr(13 /* Interface */)) within GROUP ( ORDER BY locations) FROM (SELECT ''|| (SELECT o.name FROM nc_objects o WHERE o.object_id = r.reference)||'' AS locations FROM nc_references r WHERE r.object_id = ${Sales_Order_ID} /* Sales Order */ AND r.attr_id = 9143009818513421531 /* Locations */)) LOCATION FROM nc_objects JOIN nc_references ON nc_objects.object_id = nc_references.object_id JOIN nc_objects customer_category ON customer_category.object_id = nc_references.reference JOIN nc_params ON nc_params.object_id = nc_objects.object_id JOIN nc_params a ON a.object_id = nc_objects.object_id JOIN nc_list_values ON nc_list_values.list_value_id = nc_params.list_value_id LEFT JOIN nc_params tax_exempt ON tax_exempt.object_id = nc_objects.object_id AND tax_exempt.attr_id = 9143844095213286433 LEFT JOIN nc_list_values val ON val.list_value_id = tax_exempt.list_value_id WHERE nc_references.object_id = (SELECT reference FROM nc_references WHERE object_id = ${Sales_Order_ID} /* Sales Order */ AND attr_id = 9139458719513380099 /* Customer Account */) AND nc_references.attr_id IN (7030151465013152898 /* Customer Category */) AND nc_params.attr_id = 9135888560413426581 /* Status */ AND a.attr_id = 2091641841013994123

SELECT nc_objects.object_id object_id, nc_objects.name customer_name, customer_category.name customer_category, a.value customer_account_number, nc_list_values.value status, (SELECT listagg (locations, chr(13 /* Interface */)) within GROUP ( ORDER BY locations) FROM (SELECT ''|| (SELECT o.name FROM nc_objects o WHERE o.object_id = r.reference)||'' AS locations FROM nc_references r WHERE r.object_id = ${Sales_Order_ID} /* Sales Order */ AND r.attr_id = 9143009818513421531 /* Locations */)) LOCATION FROM nc_objects JOIN nc_references ON nc_objects.object_id = nc_references.object_id JOIN nc_objects customer_category ON customer_category.object_id = nc_references.reference JOIN nc_params ON nc_params.object_id = nc_objects.object_id JOIN nc_params a ON a.object_id = nc_objects.object_id JOIN nc_list_values ON nc_list_values.list_value_id = nc_params.list_value_id LEFT JOIN nc_params tax_exempt ON tax_exempt.object_id = nc_objects.object_id AND tax_exempt.attr_id = 9143844095213286433 LEFT JOIN nc_list_values val ON val.list_value_id = tax_exempt.list_value_id WHERE nc_references.object_id = (SELECT reference FROM nc_references WHERE object_id = ${Sales_Order_ID} /* Sales Order */ AND attr_id = 9139458719513380099 /* Customer Account */) AND nc_references.attr_id IN (7030151465013152898 /* Customer Category */) AND nc_params.attr_id = 9135888560413426581 /* Status */ AND a.attr_id = 2091641841013994123
